import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FiPlay, FiStar, FiTrendingUp, FiClock } from 'react-icons/fi'; import Icon from '../components/Icon'; const Home: React.FC = () => { // Featured movies that would typically come from an API const featuredMovies = [ { id: '1', title: 'Inception', image: 'https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9gk7adHYeDvHkCSEqAvQNLV5Uge.jpg', year: '2010', rating: 8.4 }, { id: '2', title: 'Interstellar', image: 'https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gEU2QniE6E77NI6lCU6MxlNBvIx.jpg', year: '2014', rating: 8.3 }, { id: '3', title: 'The Dark Knight', image: 'https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qJ2tW6WMUDux911r6m7haRef0WH.jpg', year: '2008', rating: 8.5 }, { id: '4', title: 'Pulp Fiction', image: 'https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/d5iIlFn5s0ImszYzBPb8JPIfbXD.jpg', year: '1994', rating: 8.5 }, { id: '5', title: 'The Godfather', image: 'https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3bhkrj58Vtu7enYsRolD1fZdja1.jpg', year: '1972', rating: 8.7 }, { id: '6', title: 'The Shawshank Redemption', image: 'https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/q6y0Go1tsGEsmtFryDOJo3dEmqu.jpg', year: '1994', rating: 8.7 }, { id: '7', title: 'The Matrix', image: 'https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/f89U3ADr1oiB1s9GkdPOEpXUk5H.jpg', year: '1999', rating: 8.1 }, { id: '8', title: 'Fight Club', image: 'https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8kNruSfhk5IoE4eZOc4UpvDn6tq.jpg', year: '1999', rating: 8.4 }, { id: '9', title: 'Goodfellas', image: 'https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/aKuFiU82s5ISJpGZp7YkIr3kCUd.jpg', year: '1990', rating: 8.5 }, { id: '10', title: 'Parasite', image: 'https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7IiTTgloJzvGI1TAYymCfbfl3vT.jpg', year: '2019', rating: 8.5 }, { id: '11', title: 'The Lord of the Rings', image: 'https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6oom5QYQ2yQTMJIbnvbkBL9cHo6.jpg', year: '2001', rating: 8.3 }, { id: '12', title: 'Forrest Gump', image: 'https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/saHP97rTPS5eLmrLQEcANmKrsFl.jpg', year: '1994', rating: 8.5 }, { id: '13', title: 'The Silence of the Lambs', image: 'https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rplLJ2hPcOQmkFhTqUte0MkEaO2.jpg', year: '1991', rating: 8.3 }, { id: '14', title: 'Schindler\'s List', image: 'https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sF1U4EUQS8YHUYjNl3pMGNIQyr0.jpg', year: '1993', rating: 8.6 }, { id: '15', title: 'Spirited Away', image: 'https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/39wmItIWsg5sZMyRUHLkWBcuVCM.jpg', year: '2001', rating: 8.5 } ]; // Recent reviews (mock data) const recentReviews = [ { id: '101', movieTitle: 'Inception', movieId: '1', userAvatar: 'https://randomuser.me/api/portraits/men/32.jpg', userName: 'John Smith', rating: 4.5, content: 'A mind-bending journey that makes you question reality. The visual effects are groundbreaking and the story is complex yet engaging.', date: '2 days ago' }, { id: '102', movieTitle: 'The Dark Knight', movieId: '3', userAvatar: 'https://randomuser.me/api/portraits/women/44.jpg', userName: 'Sarah Johnson', rating: 5, content: 'Heath Ledger\'s Joker performance is legendary. This film transcends the superhero genre and stands as one of the greatest films ever made.', date: '1 week ago' } ]; return (
